item.description: 1.64.0 (Unreleased) # Implement network primitives with ideal Rust layout, not C system layout Warn about dead tuple struct fields Utilize PGO for windows x64 rustc dist builds Implement fmt::Write for OsString allow unions with mutable references and tuples of allowed types Stabilize core::ffi:c_* and re-export in std::ffi Remove restrictions on compare-exchange memory ordering. Stabilize Windows FileTypeExt with is_symlink_dir and is_symlink_file Let rust-analyzer ship on stable, non-preview Stabilize into_future relate closure_substs.

1.65.0 (Unreleased) # Stabilize const_ptr_offset_from. Don’t derive PartialEq::ne. consider unnormalized types for implied bounds Update to LLVM 15 Stabilize std::io::read_to_string Stringify non-shorthand visibility correctly Update the minimum external LLVM to 13 Sunset RLS
